description.value:
Your warmask sharpens your connection to the source of your mask's power. During your daily preparations, choose @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Fear]{Fear}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Phantom Pain]{Phantom Pain}, or @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.True Strike]{True Strike}.

Until your next daily preparations, you can cast this spell as a 1st-level innate spell once per day; the spell's tradition is determined by the tradition tied to your warmask. You must be wearing your warmask to Cast the Spell.
